subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nelson Cruz has returned from a drug suspension to hit .291 with 28 homers and 74 runs batted in for the Orioles, and fans elected him to start in next week’s All-Star Game.
snippet: Nelson Cruz has returned from a drug suspension to hit .291 with 28 homers and 74 runs batted in for the Orioles, and fans elected him to start in next week’s All-Star Game.
